de.hpi.semrecsys.persistence

Class AbstractDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.semrecsys.persistence.AbstractDAO
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicDAO, CategoryDAO, ProductCategoryDAO, ProductDAO, RecommendationDAO

    public abstract class AbstractDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract handler for persistence objects uses DBObject
    handles SessionFactory
    implements basic functionality common for all
    represents standard data access object pattern
    See Also:
    DAO
